comment: Wonderful, knowledgeable and really funny.  His humor and expertise made me look forward to the class. Pros:  it was exceptionally fascinating to watch him narrate observations, developmental stages, and tell stories with his animated personality. Cons, did not seem to want to assist out of class and slacked off mid semester, behind on grading, etc

When you sign up for Dr. Bell's class apparently you get his wife now instead. She has never taught a college course before and it's painfully obvious. He approves of your project, she says no. He gives you a due date and THREE days before the due date, she changes it. I used to love Dr. Bell, but now I will never sign up for his class again.

Be careful when signing up for his class, you may end up with his ridiculous wife. He will more than likely be in your classroom the whole time cutting into her teaching. But, unfortunately at the end of the day she's the one grading. She gets mad when you go above her head and speak to Dr. Bell directly.

I love Dr. Bell, He makes every class fun and you learn a lot in the process. His work load is HUGE But He's flexible with due dates which really helps, But I would recommend following the due dates so you don't end up stressed at the end of the semester because there is a lot to do.I would take him again in a heart beat!

Really great professor.  The preschool class contains a LOT of work.  Dr. Bell is extremely flexible with his deadlines and is literally the preschool guru.  Great class!!  This isn't the class for procrastinators.  The workload is HUGE.
Awesome class, but a LOT of work.  He is very flexible on due dates.  As long as you try hard and keep up with all the work, its an easy A.
Great and Fun Teacher. Knows his subject and loves to teach. He will help you with anything you need whether school related or not. I strongly recommend him.

Dr. Bell is great!  His classes are fun, he's a blast and really knows his stuff.  We spent half the class laughing. The workload is unbelievable, but if you stay on track with the outline he provides, you'll do fine.  He's flexible with assignment due dates, but you have to do all assignments to pass the class.  Take him, you'll learn a lot!

Took Bell for ECE 3313&3350: both classes were LOTS of work.  None of the work is very challenging or hard.  However, all assignments are VERY time consuming & he gives a TON of work! If you don't mind sitting for hours doing busy work to get an A then take him! He also lets you correct work if you turn it in "early" (he usually ignores due dates!)

Just finished up my semester and had Dr. Bell for 3313 and 3350.  Don't let anyone full you these classes are no joke.  Lots of work and time need to be dedicated to homework.  As long as you stay on track with Dr. Bells suggested schedule its not to overwhelming.  Dr. Bell is an amazing teacher, easy grader and very flexible with due dates.

Dr. Bell is a GREAT professor.  I changed my schedule for next semester so that I may have him again.  Yes his classes are a LOT of work, but he is very flexible with due dates.  Really enjoyed his lectures, and overall a phenomenal teacher.  Highly recommend! He teaches to perfection, so no way you can't get an A in his class!

He is a good teacher -funny, flexible in turining in your work, and grades easy -but the amount of work he gave for this class was crazy. It was too much, and more than other classes. His ruberics were lengthy and confusing because sometimes there was more than one and you couldn't find it or figure it out. He was nice but class was time consuming.

DR. BELL IS AWESOME!!! He class is really interesting and he has great stories AND I spend half the time laughing. There is a big workload but he is flexible on due dates and a very fair grader. I learned a lot and wish I could take him for every class! I never bought the book and did fine, although you may need it for some reference.
Really nice teacher, but sometimes unclear. The material isn't overwhelming, but it's important to stay organized and on top of things!

I had Dr. Bell for ECE 3313 and 3350! He is a great teacher and has tons of information to share with you. He is very understanding about the amount of work given and allows you to turn things in when your able to. There is a lot of material to be covered in these two classes, and he does his best to help out!

Awesome teacher! A lot of projects that are sometimes time-consuming but they were fun and he grades fairly easy. Learned a lot and appreciated his understanding and fun stories that related to material.

Dr. Doug is awesome! He is extremely enthusiastic about his class and the material. You hardly need the book because he knows so much and TEACHES! He has floating due dates b/c he understands stress, too. I learned a LOT from his class, and will definitiely be taking him again for ECE 3313!!
Mr. Doug is a great teacher.  Very passionate about teaching.  I learned a lot.  Attendance is mandatory, but class is interesting.  Would definitely take another class taught by him!!
